response.original_title: Dr. XYZ: A Medical Drag Transthology
response.overview: Dr. XYZ is a community-made trans+ healthcare training film and ethnofiction. It is an exercise in queering the public information film genre, shot in 16mm. The film weaves ethnographic healthcare accounts from Birmingham’s trans+ community with moments of drag-satire re-enactment to depict a collective vision of the UK’s healthcare system.
response.title: Dr. XYZ: A Medical Drag Transthology
